steps.details: Go to http://www.ewubd.edu or directly to http://admission.ewubd.edu
Click 'Create New Applicant' and select desired program. Program cannot be changed later.
Fill in Name, Mobile Number, Email (optional). A unique 'EWU Login ID' will be generated and shown on the next screen.
Example: 163354131. Required for payment and login. Also sent via email. Pay slip can be downloaded/printed.
Use EWU Login ID and Mobile Number to sign in after payment clearance.

instructions: Applicant responsible for correctness of info

details: Applicants may save form for review/edit

steps.details: After successful submission, a confirmation message appears: 'Your form has been submitted successfully. For obtaining the Admit Card click on the Admit Card'.

details: Download/print Admit Card any time using EWU Login ID + Mobile Number
Admit Card is mandatory for admission test
Original HSC/Equivalent registration card OR A-Level statement of entry
Required during admission test and final admission (if qualified)

g_suite_activation.note: Students must activate their EWU G Suite email account. Personal email accounts will not be accepted.
instructions: Go to http://portal.ewubd.edu using Chrome, Firefox, or Safari.
Enter Student ID in the Student ID field.
Receive OTP on registered mobile number.
Enter OTP and set password to activate portal access.
After activation, log in with Student ID, password, and captcha.
Log in to the portal at http://portal.ewubd.edu
Click on 'VIEW ADVISED COURSES' to see advising slip
Save or print advising slip as needed
advising_slip.purpose: Shows advised courses, class schedule, and routine based on academic calendar

requirements: Pay tuition fees within stipulated time mentioned in advising slip
Payment must be cleared to continue classes
payment_methods: Any branch of three designated banks (mentioned on advising slip)
tuition_payment.important_note: Do not use agent banking systems. They do not report deposit information properly.

important_notes: Decision of EWU Admission Committee is final.
Applicant must provide valid and truthful information.

admission_office.address: A/2 Jahurul Islam Avenue, Jahurul Islam City, Aftabnagar, Dhaka
